body:
This PR adds a new command, `spack license update-copyright-year`, that automatically updates the copyright year in files that should have a license header.

It also updates the set of licensed files, and uses the command to update all copyright headers for 2021.
    
- [x] add `spack license update-copyright-year` command + test
- [x] add `concretize.lp`, `spack.yaml`, etc. to licensed files
- [x] update all licensed files to say 2013-2021 using `spack license update-copyright-year`
title: Update copyright year for 2021
